name: Anjos do Brasil
tag_list: angel, angels, angel-investor, angel-investing, brazil, brasil
overview:
Anjos do Brasil is a angel investor network dedicated to foster angel investment for supporting inovative entrepreneurs in Brazil. It was founded by Cassio Spina, a entrepreneur and a angel investor with over 25 years experience in tech industry (see more at http://www.crunchbase.com/person/cassio-spina-3) .

Receiving support of major brazilian institutions related to entrepreneurship and investments, such as Endeavor Brasil, ABVCAP, BM&F BOVESPA, FIESP/CJE, Brazil Innovators, etc., Anjos do Brasil is commited to connect investors with entrepreneurs in order to help growing new business in Brazil.

We do also keep relationship with major VC investment funds, in order to exchange investment opportunities between our members and them. Anjos do Brasil is advised by a seasoned board of advisors, that support our strategic actions for promoting our vision.

We promote events between our members and some also for entrepreneurs, for both educating the community and connecting people, to empower their relations

If you wish to contact us, please, visit our site at www.anjosdobrasil.net and leave a message.
